title: Eduard Son
text:
Eduard Vasilyevich Son (; born 18 September 1964) is a retired <a href="Soviet%20Union">Soviet</a> and <a href="Kazakhstan">Kazakhstan</a>i professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player of <a href="Koryo-saram">Korean ethnic origin</a>. He lives in <a href="France">France</a>.
European club competitions.
With <a href="FC%20Dnipro%20Dnipropetrovsk">FC Dnipro Dnipropetrovsk</a>.
